content.description: Sit start on low edges towards the right side under the slight overhang, go up past slightly reachy crimps and edges to mantle onto the tough slopey arete/feature.
content.location: Webslinger starts just to the right of Adamantium Claws, towards the left on the left side of the boulder, and towards the right under the slight overhang...on some low edges.

content.description: Sit start is hollow and sounds like it'll pop off if you pull on it, so squat/stand start doubled on the obvious horizontal fissure/edge at about chest height...pull on, move up to the slightly overhanging crack and follow this up through the dihedral to a loose and dirty top out.
content.location: To the left of Krymptonite Arete, in the chossy dihedral

content.description: Sit start is rotten and could fall on you, so stand start and climb the chossy fin to the loose and dirty, but better than Utility Belt and Krymptonite, top out.
content.location: This route is to the left of Utility Belt, and climbs the fin with a hollow lower section. This is the last route to the left, on the right side of the Superhero boulder...to the left of this is an unclimbable area before getting to the left side of the Superhero boulder.

content.description: Sit start on the giant knob and head straight up, using mini edges and crimps, to the bomber top out.
content.location: This route starts on a giant knob sticking out of the middle of the left side of the Superhero boulder

content.description: Sit start doubled on a knob on the right side corner of the Superhero boulder, go up the arete using well placed sidepulls and edges, past a few jugs and hollow holds to a suspect top out. The more this is climbed and the top is cleaned up, it might become one of the better problems at Stony. Best route on this boulder.
content.location: Located on the far right side of the Superhero boulder

content.description: Sit start, below the V knotch at the top of the boulder, on some crimps and edges and follow well placed mini edges and crimps to the knotch at the top. Be careful of the right side of the knotch as it seems a little detached and could pop off if pulled on too hard.
content.location: This is the right most route on the left side of the Superhero boulder.

content.description: Sit start on low edges under the slightly overhang, bust up and left to a good but reachy edge and on to the top lip...mantle onto the lip to top out.
content.location: Adamantium Claws starts on the far left side, of the left side of the boulder, on some low edges.

climbs.name: "You Wouldn't Like Me When I'm Angry"

content.description: Sit start on good edges to the left of the giant knob and head straight up the crimpy face to a bomber top out.
content.location: YWLMWIA sit starts on 2 low edges to the left of the giant knob sticking out of the left side of the boulder.
